jobs.position: Software Engineer 3, Scrum Lead, Principal Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Brought on after a rough start of their year, I came in and lead a
small team to deliver the “Self Install” feature for customers. I
organized the team’s Jira project and we developed a fast paced
flow that gave insight to management on how we deliver and
when we would succeed. My main job was to be a full-stack dev
and fill in for the missing front-end experiences, but I ended up
leading the team during a human resource shift.
bullets:
Tailored work for offshore Macedonia to have a constant
flow of work.
Drove the collaboration between multiple disparate parties.

Stabilized deployment practice of a few internal tools
through inter-team coordination.

Worked closely with the QA lead to communicate
deficiencies in our solution.

jobs.position:
Technical Lead of the Acquisitions Team, Senior Software
Developer
jobs.description:
I continued my role as an experienced full-stack web engineer.
My team and I delivered a long deferred and awaited project, a
responsive web-app upgrade for their credit unions’ online loan
application form built on React/Redux and .Net Core. I worked
with their core enterprise team to get the system headed into the
microservices direction the company desired. While, on the
daily, supporting the team’s web development needs.
bullets:
Encouraged/Educated the team on all browser technology
needs.
Supported my group through cross-team collaboration.

Provided the in-depth knowledge of how the system
worked.

jobs.company: Open Technology Solutions (OTS) as part of Gavinheath
jobs.position: Senior Software Developer placed by Gavinheath
jobs.description:
Working at OTS, a company that provides IT/Development
services for three credit unions (Bellco, Bethpage, SECU), I used
my skills to help deliver quality software. A team of contractors
and I delivered a data migration project to its finish on tight
deadlines, while maintaining as much of the coding standards
and SDLC Agile process. My primary role was to build the front-
end using C# with ASP.NET MVC to communicate with an
ASP.NET Core WebAPI project.
bullets: Encouraged/Educated the team on use of git

Built an encryption library/tool to the security teams
standards for interfacing with a third party.

Continuously upgraded the teams internal web tool for the
business rules.
